Detailed Description

template<unsigned D, typename N = double>
template<unsigned i, unsigned D_>
struct VecMath::Matrix< D, N >::VecMath::Matrix::MultiplyColLoop< i, 0, D_ >

Calculate one row of the product of two matrices.

Loop over the columns of two matrices to multiply them in loop()
Specialization for j = 0
